General.Name: Eltel AB (publ)
General.Description: Eltel AB (publ) provides services for the power and communication infrastructure networks in Sweden, Finland, Norway, Poland, Denmark, Germany, Lithuania, and internationally. The company builds, maintains, and upgrades power transmission systems, as well as power distribution networks. It also designs, plans, builds, installs, upgrades, operates, and services mobile and fixed communication networks. In addition, the company offers wind power solutions and substations; and services for power meters, as well as designs, implements, and maintains electric vehicle charging infrastructure projects; resales public charging stations; installs solar parks; implements and maintains energy storage projects; and builds and maintains a range of public infrastructure, including digital signage, railway signaling systems, smart level crossings, and hospital communication infrastructure. Further, it provides maintenance services, which comprise scheduled and corrective care services and connect services; upgrade and conversion services to recover and upgrade the condition or technology of an existing infrastructure network; and project delivery services that include engineering and delivering customer specific network infrastructure projects. The company offers its services to national transmission system operators, power distribution grids, telecom operators, and other communication network owners. Eltel AB (publ) was founded in 2001 is headquartered in Bromma, Sweden.
